_header: Saint Christina the holy thing as I you tell can
Subjects: saints’ lives; Christina, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Christina in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Cristine þe holi þing as ic ȝou telle conHoli
                    lif ladde & clene & wel ȝou telle con…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Wiþ torment as ȝe haweþ ihurd & eiþ
                    wounder monionNou god uor þe loue of hir ous bringe þuder
                    echon

Bod779.First Lines:
Seyn cristyne þe holy þyng as I ȝou telle canHolyff
                    ledde & clene & wel ȝonge by gan…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Wit turmentes as ȝe habbeþ I herd wit woundes meny
                    onnow god for þe loue of here þedir vs brynge echon
Bod779.Attributed Title:
Seint cristine þe holy virgine (f. 17); Explycit sante cristy[ ] (f.
                    21)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Cristine þis holi þing as I ow telle conHoli lyf
                    ladde and clene and wel ȝong bigon…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Wiþ turmens as ȝe hau herd wiþ woundes mony
                    onNou God for þe loue of hire vs bringe þider vchon.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Cristyne þat holy thing as I ȝou telle canHoly lif
                    ladde & clene & wel ȝong bigan…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Wiþ turment as ȝe haue y herd wiþ woundes
                    manyonNou god for þe loue of hire vs bring þider
                    echon
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayn Cristyne þe maiden suete als I ȝou tel canTo lyfe
                    halyli & clene ful ȝonge sho beganA heghe Justis hir fadre was his
                    name was calde VrbanVndre þe emperoure he was þat hight
                    Dioclician…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…And cristyne to þe blis of heuen with angels went
                    ywisNow ihesu criste for sristen lufe brynge vs to þat
                    blis

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte cristine þe holy þing as ich ȝou telle
                    canHoly lif ladde and clene and wel Yong bigan…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Wiþ tormens as ȝe habbeþ ihurd wiþ wonden moni
                    onNou god for þe loue of hure us bringe þuder echon
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.315-27.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint cristine þe holy þing as ich ȝou telle canHoly
                    lif ȝeo ladde and clene and wel ȝong þer to by
                    gan…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Wiþ turmentȝ as ȝe habbeþ yhurd and woundes
                    many onNow god ffor þe loue of hure þuder vs bringe
                    euerichon

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint cristine þe holy þing as ic ȝou telle canholy
                    lyf ladde & clene & wel ȝonge by gan…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…With turmens as ȝe habbeþ y herd & woundes many
                    ongod for þe loue of hure ous bringe þuder echon

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEinte cristine þat holy þing ac y ȝou telle canholy
                    lif ladde & clene & wel ȝong by gan…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Wiþ tormens as ȝe haviþ y hurde wiþ wonden
                    many onNou god for þe loue of hire vs bringe þuder
                    echon
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De Sancta cristina (f. 135v, by scribe in margine beside
                    first line); Cristina (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint cristine þe holi þing as ich ȝow telle canholi lif ladde & clene & wel ȝong bigan…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …wit tormens as ȝhe haue i herd with woundes monionnou god for þe loue of hire ous bringe þuþer echon
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum li” added to right margin by later hand (f. 110).

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Cristyn þat holy þinge as I ȝou telle canHoly
                    lif lad and clene and ful ȝonge she bygan…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Wiþ turmetry as ȝe han herd & woundys many
                    onNow god for þe loue of hur bring vs þider echon
TokyoTak54.Note: Includes 16 unique couplets in various places.
TokyoTak54.Editions:
Pickering,   Oliver S.,  and  Manfred Görlach.
